Key Match Events: Pakistan lost their match against Zimbabwe in the final ball of the over
Babar Azam’s team failed to score runs against a disciplined Zimbabwe bowling attack
Zimbabwe held their nerves and defended 11 runs in the final over of the play, securing a nerve-wracking win against Pakistan
Post-Match Reflections: Wasim Akram reacted to the loss and put out a tweet expressing his shock
Massive criticism came across the Pakistan side who were called average by fans and pundits alike for failing to finish games from winning positions
Shoaib Akhtar called the team and its management average and expressed his disappointment
